Title: Delve Hunter
Description:
A few of our explorer's have come back battered and bruised from delves. They speak of a terrible monster called Zekvir. 

Perhaps you've heard of this creature? Allow me to tell you more of what we've learned.
ObjectivesText: Discover more about Zekvir, Hand of the Harbinger.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Speak with Brann Bronzebeard within the Delver's Headquarters.
